TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Threading.Tasks.Task<string> KeyVaultClient.AuthenticationCallback(string authority, string resource, string scope);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed KeyVaultClient/AuthenticationCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Identifier of the authority, a URL.
Identifier of the target resource that is the recipient of the requested token, a URL.
The scope of the authentication request.
Docs.summary: The authentication callback delegate which is to be implemented by the client code
